body: To make a haunt like the example below, follow these steps.
name: Creating a Haunt

sections.body: A haunt's base CR is equal to 1 + the level of the spell it duplicates.
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Haunts/Creating a Haunt/Step 1-Determine Base CR
sections.name: Step 1-Determine Base CR

sections.body: Select the elements you want the haunt to have and add up the adjustments to its CR to arrive at the haunt's final CR (see Table 8–2: CR Modifiers for Haunts).
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Haunts/Creating a Haunt/Step 2-Determine Actual CR
sections.name: Step 2-Determine Actual CR

sections.body: A haunt's caster level is equal to its actual CR score.
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Haunts/Creating a Haunt/Step 3-Determine Caster Level
sections.name: Step 3-Determine Caster Level

sections.body: A haunt's hit points are equal to twice its CR (or equal to its CR × 4.5 if the haunt is persistent).
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Haunts/Creating a Haunt/Step 4-Determine Hit Points
sections.name: Step 4-Determine Hit Points

sections.body: A haunt's attack modifier (if one is needed) is equal to its CR. If a haunt's spell effect allows a saving throw to resist or negate the effect, the save DC is equal to 10 + the level of the spell + the ability modifier of the minimum ability score needed to cast that level of spell.
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Haunts/Creating a Haunt/Step 5-Calculate Attacks and Save DCs
sections.name: Step 5-Calculate Attacks and Save DCs

sections.notice: Perception DC 20 (to hear the sound of soft sobbing)
sections.name: Bleeding Walls
sections.url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Haunts/Creating a Haunt/Bleeding Walls
sections.effect: When this haunt is triggered, thick rivulets of blood course down the walls accompanied by the shrill shriek of a woman's scream. All creatures in the hallway are targeted by a fear spell (save DC 16).
sections.destruction: The body of the maid entombed behind the walls must be extracted and given a proper burial.
